value.title: How a startup uses AI to put worker safety first
value.excerpt: Everguard combines AI, computer vision, and sensor fusion to prioritize worker safety and reduce the risk of injuries and accidents.

value.title: Army Sets Up New Quantum Computing Lab, Artificial Intelligence Centre. Details Here
value.excerpt: The Army has set up a quantum computing laboratory and a centre for artificial intelligence (AI) at a military engineering institute in Madhya Pradesh's Mhow.

value.title: Alexa Shockingly Tells 10-Year-Old Girl To Put A Penny Into An Electrical Socket, Which Provides Important Lessons For AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: A recent news report about Alexa telling a young girl to do a dangerous stunt is a reminder that we need to be wary of the things that AI tells us to do, including in the home and even while riding in AI-based self-driving cars.

value.title: Data Integrity And AI: Why You Need Both To Power Trusted Business Decisions
value.excerpt: Companies need trusted data, not just big data. That’s why any discussion about AI/ML is also a discussion about data integrity.

value.title: Learn artificial intelligence, machine learning, Python and more for under $30

value.title: Geely’s Zeekr partners with Waymo to build its self-driving taxi fleet for the US market
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, the Chinese multinational automotive company Geely announced that their premium electric brand, Zeekr, will partner up with Waymo. This partnership is to build an all-electric, self-driving vehicle for the Waymo One ride-hailing autonomous fleet in the United States.

value.title: India's Airtel, TCS tap robotics to build 5G-based units

value.title: China unveils five-year plan for robotics
value.excerpt: The five-year plan details the overarching goal of making China a key source of global robotics innovation by 2025.

value.title: Chinese Professor Lands $3.4 Billion Fortune With SenseTime IPO
